titleStmt.title: Pax vobis, or, Gospel and liberty against ancient and modern papists / by a preacher of the word.
titleStmt.author: Brown, S. J.
Gordon, John, 1644-1726.
Griffith, Evan, A.M., Minister of Alderly.

editionStmt.edition: The fifth edition corrected and amended.

notesStmt.note: Other editions read: by E.G. a preacher of the word.
Variously attributed to Evan Griffith, S.J. Brown, and John Clement Gordon.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
